hero.title: Powering Industries, Shaping The Future
hero.description: Shammout Group has been shaping industries for over 70 years, leading in automotive, aviation, steel, energy, and more. Discover our journey and be part of the future.

about.title: About Shammout Group
about.description: With over 70 years of excellence, Shammout Group has evolved from a trading company into the most influential trading enterprise in the region spanning multiple industries, including automotive, aviation, steel, energy, real estate, and food.
about.growthDescription: From a pioneering trading company to a multi-sector group of companies, Shammout Group's relentless drive for excellence has resulted in annual revenues exceeding $200 million. Today, we thrive across various industries, cementing our reputation as a dynamic leader in the region.

aboutshammot.title: About Shammout Group
aboutshammot.description: With over 70 years of excellence, Shammout Group has evolved from a trading company into the most influential trading enterprise in the region spanning multiple industries, including automotive, aviation, steel, energy, real estate, and food.

values.title: Our Values
values.integrity_description: Upholding ethical practices in every aspect of our business.
values.innovation_description: Continuously seeking creative solutions and improvements.
values.excellence_description: Striving for the highest standards in all our endeavors.

industries.title: Industries We Lead
industries.description: With over seven decades of responsible business practices, we lead diverse sectors, from automotive and aviation to real estate, energy, metals, and food industries, driving innovation, sustainability, and economic progress.
industries.shammout_auto_description: Assembling Excellence: Shammout Auto specializes in assembling and selling around 10,000 vehicles annually across various categories, including passenger cars, SUVs, pickups, buses, and trucks. The company partners with major automobile brands, ensuring high-quality production and comprehensive vehicle inspection systems.
industries.damask_metals_description: Strengthening Manufacturing: Founded in 2002, Damask Metals Co. is a leader in steel trading and manufacturing in Syria. The company produces pipes, tubes, poles, and towers while trading a wide range of steel products, including rebar, wires, beams, sheets, and coils.

milestones.title: A Legacy of Innovation: Our Milestones & Achievements
milestones.description: At Shammout Group, every milestone reflects a step forward in innovation, expansion, and industry leadership. From a small trading company to a multi-sector powerhouse, we have shaped industries and built a legacy that continues to grow.
milestones.new_stream_line_description: Entered the automotive industry, launching a state-of-the-art car assembly plant, later evolving into Shammout Auto Factory.
milestones.strengthening_industry_description: Established Damask Metals Co., becoming a leader in steel manufacturing and trading.

partner.title: Partner With Us – A Future of Endless Possibilities
partner.description: We don't just create businesses—we believe in lasting partnerships that drive industries forward. With a legacy of excellence, we invite you to collaborate, invest, and expand with a trusted leader to shape the future of commerce and industry.

footer.newsletterDescription: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive the latest news straight to your inbox.

reachUs.title: Reach Us
reachUs.description: We are here to connect with you! Whether you are looking for business collaboration, seeking information, or simply wishing to get in touch, we are here to provide the support and expertise you need.

assistanceSection.title: Need Assistance? We're Here to Support You.

partnerWithShammout: Partner with Shammout Group. Let’s Shape the Future Together
descriptionText: At Shammout Group, we believe that great partnerships build an extraordinary future. We invite you to partner with us in creating innovative solutions, enhancing industries, and empowering communities through collaboration. We welcome strategic alliances, joint ventures, and partnerships that drive value and mutual growth.
name: Name
thankYouMessage: Thank you for partnering with Shammout! We will contact you shortly.

aboutshammoutsection.growth_description: From a pioneering trading company to a multi-sector group of companies, Shammout Group’s relentless drive for excellence has resulted in annual revenues exceeding $200 million. Today, we thrive across various industries, cementing our reputation as a dynamic leader in the region.
aboutshammoutsection.mission_description: To be a trusted partner across industries by embracing innovation, upholding quality, and delivering solutions that empower businesses and sustainable growth.
aboutshammoutsection.vision_description: To be recognized as a global leader in business, contributing to the innovation of all industries’ benchmarks of excellence.
